xMatixPlatform.title: xMatix Field Sales
xMatixPlatform.description1: Plan routes. Execute consistently. Close with confidence.
xMatixPlatform.description2: xMatix Field Sales helps teams plan routes, execute store visits, capture orders, and enforce execution standards in real time.

whatIsIt.title: How We Help
whatIsIt.description2:
Most field sales teams struggle with missed visits, inconsistent execution, manual reporting, and limited visibility.

xMatix Field Sales standardizes how visits are planned, executed, and tracked so every visit follows a governed process.

data.coreCapabilitiesDescription: xMatix Field Sales modernizes field execution without replacing CRM or ERP systems.
data.executionModelDescription: Guided visit workflows, policy enforcement, real time data capture, and no-code adaptability ensure reliable outcomes.
data.worksWithDescription: Coordinates human actions and system updates across CRM, ERP, and downstream systems.
